name: ReWordz: Word Search Puzzles
description:
ReWordz - fun and very challenging word game!

Play an endless number of puzzles in various difficulty levels in this enjoyable, addictive word search game.

Features:
- Great, colourful graphics and animations
- 2 game modes: Classic and Challenge
- Hundreds of levels in the 'Challenge' mode
- More than 40 categories (and more are constantly added)
- 3 levels of difficulty, each with a different board size
- Power Ups to help you with those sneaky words
- More than 8000 words so you can improve your vocabulary and spelling skills
- Adapted to both tablets and mobile phones
- The game supports landscape mode for the best experience
- Easy to use gameplay: Just swipe your finger on the letters to mark the word

If you love word search puzzles, crosswords or other word games, download ReWordz and we guarantee you'll have a great time playing it. Enjoy the best word search puzzle available!!

Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/rewordz
